controllerclass

Class userController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllerclass.userController

  • public class userController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class "userController" is a controllerclass. It controlls all processes that effects the dataclass user. its a list, that saves all users.

      • userCreate

        public user userCreate(java.lang.String newMail,
                       java.lang.String newName,
                       java.lang.String newPW)
        the method creates a new user and inserts it into the list. It proofs, that the name and the mail isnt used twice.
        Parameters:
        newMail - user.mail
        newName - user.name
        newPW - user.PW
        Returns:
        returns created user

      • userDelete

        public int userDelete(user OldUser,
                      picController picctrl)
        Deletes a user and removes him from list. Also deletes all pictures related to that user and removes them from piclist
        Parameters:
        OldUser - user that should be deleted
        picctrl - actual picController
        Returns:
        -1 = error, 0 is good

      • changeEmail

        public int changeEmail(user changingUser,
                       java.lang.String newMail)
        Changes the mail from a user. Proof if mail is used.
        Parameters:
        changingUser - user, which mail should change
        newMail - new mail
        Returns:
        -1 = error, 0 is good

      • changePW

        public int changePW(user changingUser,
                    java.lang.String newPW)
        changes the password from a user.
        Parameters:
        changingUser - user, which password should change
        newPW - new password
        Returns:
        -1 = error, 0 is good

      • printUser

        -1 = error, 0 is good
